metadata.description: Comprehensive test prompts - corrected complexity levels

prompts.name: cube
prompts.prompt: Create a cube 50 mm × 50 mm × 50 mm.

prompts.name: cylinder
prompts.prompt: Create a cylinder diameter 40 mm height 60 mm.

prompts.name: cone
prompts.prompt: Create a cone base diameter 50 mm height 60 mm.

prompts.name: sphere
prompts.prompt: Create a sphere diameter 80 mm.

prompts.name: arc
prompts.prompt: Create an arc radius 60 mm sweep 210 deg.

prompts.name: torus
prompts.prompt: Create a torus major radius 50 mm minor radius 8 mm.

prompts.name: pipe
prompts.prompt: Create a pipe outer radius 20 mm inner radius 15 mm length 150 mm with 1 mm chamfer on both ends

prompts.name: screw
prompts.prompt: Create a screw with cylindrical shaft radius 4 mm length 50 mm, hexagonal head diameter 12 mm height 5 mm

prompts.name: table
prompts.prompt: Create a table: make a rectangular top 200 mm × 100 mm × 15 mm, add four cylindrical legs diameter 12 mm height 120 mm inset 15 mm from each corner under the top, and union all parts.

prompts.name: bowl
prompts.prompt: Create a hemispherical bowl by revolving a semicircle radius 40 mm to form a hemisphere, then shell 3 mm wall thickness

prompts.name: vase
prompts.prompt: Create a vase by revolving a smooth profile with radius 30 mm at base, 22 mm at mid-height 60 mm, and 35 mm at top 120 mm

prompts.name: spring
prompts.prompt: Create a helical spring by sweeping a circle radius 1.5 mm along a right-hand helix with major radius 20 mm, pitch 8 mm, total height 80 mm

prompts.name: bunny
prompts.prompt: Import and display the Stanford bunny mesh from an STL file

prompts.name: splint
prompts.prompt:
Create a resting hand splint for wrist immobilization with three anatomically-connected sections:

SECTION 1 - Forearm support:
- Length: 150mm
- Width: tapers from 70mm at proximal end to 60mm at wrist
- Curvature: 5mm palmar curve for natural wrist position

SECTION 2 - Palm platform:
- Length: 80mm
- Width: constant 75mm (widest section)
- Angle: 20 degrees upward extension from forearm axis
- Curvature: 8mm transverse arch for palm contour

SECTION 3 - Finger support:
- Length: 40mm
- Width: constant 65mm
- Position: continues palm angle
- Curvature: 3mm for MCP joint clearance

MATERIAL & STRUCTURE:
- Wall thickness: 3.5mm for rigidity
- Smooth filleted transitions: 8mm radius between all sections
- Total assembled length: 270mm

VENTILATION:
- Perforation pattern: 6mm diameter holes
- Grid layout: 10 columns × 3 rows

STRAP ATTACHMENT:
- 3 slots for velcro straps
- Slot dimensions: 25mm wide × 3mm deep
- Positions: 50mm, 150mm, 220mm from proximal end

prompts.name: stent
prompts.prompt:
Create a vascular stent with zigzag pattern:

DIMENSIONS:
- Inner diameter: 8mm
- Wall thickness: 0.3mm
- Total length: 30mm

PATTERN:
- Zigzag strut pattern with 12 peaks per circumference
- Strut width: 0.15mm
- Peak amplitude: 1.5mm from center
- Axial spacing: 2.5mm between rows
- Total of 10 rows along length

CONNECTIONS:
- Bridge connectors every 3rd peak
- Connector width: 0.12mm
- Smooth fillets at all junctions: 0.05mm radius

STRUCTURE:
- Open lattice design for flexibility
- Uniform wall thickness throughout
- Rounded strut cross-sections for biocompatibility

prompts.name: lattice
prompts.prompt:
Create a cubic lattice structure:

OVERALL DIMENSIONS:
- Cube size: 50mm × 50mm × 50mm
- Unit cell size: 5mm × 5mm × 5mm
- Total cells: 10 × 10 × 10 = 1000 cells

LATTICE GEOMETRY:
- Type: Body-centered cubic (BCC)
- Strut diameter: 0.8mm
- Node diameter: 1.2mm at intersections

STRUT PATTERN:
- 8 corner struts per cell connecting to center node
- Center node connects to 8 adjacent cell centers
- Smooth transitions at all nodes

BOUNDARY:
- Solid skin: 1mm thick on all six faces
- Smooth integration between skin and internal lattice
- Chamfer edges: 2mm radius

OPTIMIZATION:
- Remove internal material for weight reduction
- Maintain structural integrity at boundaries
- Target porosity: 70%

prompts.name: facade
prompts.prompt:
Create an architectural facade panel with parametric voronoi pattern:

PANEL DIMENSIONS:
- Width: 2000mm
- Height: 3000mm
- Base thickness: 50mm

VORONOI PATTERN:
- 25 random seed points distributed across panel
- Cell walls thickness: 30mm
- Depth variation: ranges from 10mm (shallow) to 150mm (deep)
- Organic, non-uniform distribution

DEPTH GRADIENT:
- Center cells: maximum depth (150mm)
- Edge cells: minimum depth (10mm)
- Smooth transition creating 3D relief effect

OPENINGS:
- 8 circular perforations for light transmission
- Diameter: 200mm each
- Positions: distributed within deeper cells
- Chamfered edges: 5mm radius

MOUNTING:
- 4 mounting brackets at corners
- Bracket size: 100mm × 100mm × 20mm
- Recessed 20mm into back face
- M12 bolt holes in each bracket

prompts.name: gripper
prompts.prompt:
Create a medical gripper with two opposing jaws:

BASE/HANDLE:
- Cylindrical shaft: diameter 12mm, length 80mm
- Ergonomic grip: add helical knurling pattern, pitch 2mm, depth 0.3mm
- Mounting hole: M6 thread, 20mm deep from back end

JAW ASSEMBLY:
- Two identical curved jaws, mirror symmetric
- Jaw length: 40mm from pivot point
- Jaw width: 8mm at base, tapering to 4mm at tip
- Inner surface: serrated with 0.5mm teeth, spacing 1mm
- Curvature: 10mm radius arc for gentle closure

PIVOT MECHANISM:
- Pin diameter: 3mm
- Pin position: 10mm from handle end
- Jaw spacing at rest: 15mm between tips
- Rotation range: ±30 degrees

TIP DESIGN:
- Rounded tips: 2mm radius for safety
- Contact pads: 3mm × 3mm textured area
- Pad pattern: 0.3mm diameter bumps, 0.5mm spacing

STRUCTURE:
- Wall thickness: 2mm throughout
- Filleted joints: 1mm radius at all connections
- Weight optimization: hollow handle, 1.5mm wall

prompts.name: heatsink
prompts.prompt:
Create a heatsink with optimized fin array:

BASE PLATE:
- Dimensions: 80mm × 80mm × 5mm
- Material contact surface: flat, smooth finish
- 4 mounting holes: M3, positioned 5mm from each corner
- Center clearance hole: 15mm diameter for component

FIN ARRAY:
- Number of fins: 20 parallel fins
- Fin height: 40mm
- Fin thickness: 1.5mm
- Fin spacing: 3mm (for airflow)
- Orientation: parallel to airflow direction

FIN GEOMETRY:
- Profile: straight vertical walls
- Top surface: flat with 0.5mm radius edges
- Base integration: smooth fillet 2mm radius to base plate
- Surface area optimization: maximize for convection

OPTIONAL FEATURES:
- Central cut-out: 20mm × 20mm × 10mm deep for TIM application
- Chamfered fin tips: 0.5mm × 45° to reduce vibration
- Weight reduction: 3mm diameter holes through base (avoid mounting area)
- Hole pattern: 5×5 grid, 15mm spacing

ASSEMBLY:
- Total height: 45mm (base + fins)
- Total mass target: <150g aluminum
- Thermal contact area: 6400mm² (80×80)

prompts.name: honeycomb_panel
prompts.prompt:
Create a honeycomb panel with hexagonal cells for lightweight architecture:

PANEL DIMENSIONS:
- Width: 300mm
- Height: 380mm
- Thickness: 40mm

HEXAGONAL CELLS:
- Cell size (side length): 12mm
- Wall thickness: 2.2mm
- Cell depth: 40mm (full depth through panel)
- Pattern type: flat-top hexagons

STRUCTURE:
- Only complete cells (cells entirely within panel boundaries)
- No vertical ribs, pure honeycomb pattern
- Corner fillet: 0mm (sharp edges)

MATERIAL:
- Aluminum-compatible geometry
- Optimized for CNC milling or 3D printing

prompts.name: hex_pyramid_facade
prompts.prompt:
Create a hexagonal pyramid facade with triangular elements:

HEX FRAME:
- Hex radius: 60mm
- Frame width: 8mm
- Frame height: 10mm

TRIANGULAR PYRAMIDS:
- Triangle height: 55mm
- Plate thickness: 2.4mm
- 6 pyramids arranged in hexagonal pattern

CONNECTING BARS:
- Bar width: 8mm
- Bar height: 10mm
- Radial arrangement from center

STRUCTURE:
- Architectural module
- 3D relief pattern
- Modern aesthetic

prompts.name: triangular_pavilion_louvres
prompts.prompt:
Create a triangular pavilion with diagonal louvres:

TRIANGLE BASE:
- Width: 280mm
- Height: 260mm
- Thickness: 40mm
- Corner fillet: 3mm

LOUVRES (SLATS):
- Angle: 35 degrees from horizontal
- Pitch (spacing): 12mm perpendicular to slats
- Slat width: 8mm
- Slat depth (extrusion): 12mm
- End radius: 3mm (rounded ends)
- Layer 1 Z position: 6mm

CONFIGURATION:
- Single layer of diagonal slats
- Boolean mode: union
- Pattern clips to triangle shape

prompts.name: sine_wave_fins_facade
prompts.prompt:
Create a facade with sine wave undulating fins:

PANEL DIMENSIONS:
- Length: 420mm
- Height: 180mm
- Depth: 140mm

FINS (RIBS):
- Number of fins: 34
- Fin thickness: 3mm
- Arrangement: vertical fins following sine wave

SINE WAVE PATTERN:
- Amplitude: 40mm (wave height)
- Period ratio: 0.9 (wavelength control)
- Creates smooth undulating facade

BASE STRUCTURE:
- Base plate thickness: 6mm
- Fins loft from base with sine offset
- Clips to rectangular boundary

medium.description: Intermediate complexity - multiple operations, unions, cuts

complex.description: Advanced real-world applications with multiple features
